title: Count Distinct Subsequences
statement: Given two strings S and T, count the number of distinct subsequences of S which equal T. A subsequence is a sequence derived from string by deleting some or no characters without changing the order of remaining characters.
input_format:
First line contains string S.
Second line contains string T.
output_format: Print the count of distinct subsequences. Since the answer can be large, print it modulo 10^9+7.
constraints:
1 <= |S|, |T| <= 1000
Strings contain only lowercase English letters.
